title: GoogleSheet Bulk Downloader
subtitle: Useful tool to download multiple google sheets to csv.

sections.title: Overview
content: It is very common for game projects to have a lot of tables to fill, Google sheet is one of the most useful tool to use. This tool provides a convenient process to pull all the Google sheets you need as csvs.

features.name: Multiple Google sheets to local csv files
features.description: The whole purpose of the tool is to download multiple Google sheets as csv.

sections.title: Common Usage
content: I have made a simple menu item in Unity editor to call the downloader whenever the user needs to update their tables.
